channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2024071350
item.description:
Report X-2024071350

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-23T15:14:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-02
  • City: BATON ROUGE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The package was found in unload coming off the trailer. The package was leaking from the bottom when QA found it. QA placed the package in the red bin and brought it to the hazmat cage. The bottles of multi surface cleaner inside the package had no inner packing to protect the bottles from being damaged. The bottles had no caps and one of the bottles were punctured from the bottom. The corrosive label was on the side of the box.

item.title: Report X-2024071314
item.description:
Report X-2024071314

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-22T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-15
  • City: CARENCRO
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Steel drum was found next to truck in loading process in AM sort. Drum was bent on top and crushed on one corner at top. When drum is tilted liquid spills from top corner of drum. Drum was immediately taken to QA area for processing.
